location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to J Henderson Esquire, Secretary to the Government at Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, to J Henderson Esquire, Secretary to the Government at Bombay, acknowledging the receipt of a letter sent on 11 November 1810 transmitting an invoice for thirty-five cases of plate glass on board the Thetis.
